Title: Relates to information available for inspection during certain special proceedings by tenants
Summary: Relates to information available for inspection during certain special proceedings by certain tenants for judgment directing deposit of rents that are in the possession of the department charged with the enforcement of the housing maintenance code of the municipality; relates to the effectiveness of such provisions.
LawSection: Real Property Actions and Proceedings Law
LawCode: Amd §796-k, RPAP L; amd §2, Chap of 2022 (as proposed in S.6721 & A.3241)
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property actions and proceedings law, in relation to information available for inspection during certain special proceedings by tenants; and to amend a chapter of the laws of 2022 amending the real property actions and proceedings law relating to special proceedings by tenants of dwellings outside the city of New York and certain counties for judgment directing deposit of rents and the use thereof for the purpose of remedying conditions dangerous to life, health or safety, as proposed in legislative bills numbers S. 6721 and A. 3241, in relation to the effectiveness thereof
